name: International Slice Station
description:
You and your pentuplet brothers are celebrating a birthday onboard of the International Space Station. You have been tasked with slicing the cake. Because of very scientific reasons, you only have a couple of seconds to do so.

Control scheme: 

Move: WASD

Cut: Move the mouse in the direction of the cut

Thrusters: Space/ctrl

Made using Unreal Engine 4 and FMOD Studio

Made by: 

Emelie Edholm 

Niklas Evertsson

Robert Harper

Michał Pukała

Paul Robertson
